verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אַל־ [T'al- תַּשְׁחֵ֑ת <WH516> tash-Chet; Altaschith מִזְמ֖וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <WH623> le-'a-Saf of Asaph שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> Shir. [or] Song ה֘וֹדִ֤ינוּ <WH3034> ho-Di-nu do we give thanks לְּךָ֨׀ le-Cha אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, Unto thee O God ה֭וֹדִינוּ <WH3034> Ho-di-nu [unto thee] do we give thanks וְקָר֣וֹב <WH7138> ve-ka-Rov is near שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> she-Me-cha; for [that] thy name סִ֝פְּר֗וּ <WH5608> sip-pe-Ru, declare נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha. thy wondrous works

כִּ֭י <WH3588> ki When אֶקַּ֣ח <WH3947> 'ek-Kach When I shall receive מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; the congregation אֲ֝נִ֗י <WH589> 'a-Ni, I מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <WH4339> mei-sha-Rim uprightly אֶשְׁפֹּֽט׃ <WH8199> 'esh-Pot. I will judge

נְֽמֹגִ֗ים <WH4127> ne-mo-Gim, thereof are dissolved אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz The earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> yo-she-Vei-ha; and all the inhabitants אָנֹכִ֨י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi is I תִכַּ֖נְתִּי <WH8505> tik-Kan-ti I bear up עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <WH5982> 'am-mu-Dei-ha the pillars סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. of it Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti I said לַֽ֭הוֹלְלִים <WH1984> La-hol-lim unto the fools אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תָּהֹ֑לּוּ <WH1984> ta-Hol-lu; Deal not foolishly וְ֝לָרְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> ve-la-re-sha-'Im, and to the wicked אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תָּרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> ta-Ri-mu Lift not up קָֽרֶן׃ <WH7161> Ka-ren. the horn

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תָּרִ֣ימוּ <WH7311> ta-Ri-mu Lift not up לַמָּר֣וֹם <WH4791> lam-ma-Rom on high קַרְנְכֶ֑ם <WH7161> kar-ne-Chem; your horn תְּדַבְּר֖וּ <WH1696> te-dab-be-Ru speak בְצַוָּ֣אר <WH6677> ve-tzav-Var neck עָתָֽק׃ <WH6277> 'a-Tak. [not with] a stiff

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor מִ֭מּוֹצָא <WH4161> Mi-mo-tza [cometh] neither from the east וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <WH4628> u-mi-ma-'a-Rav; nor from the west וְ֝לֹ֗א <WH3808> ve-Lo, Nor מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> mi-mid-Bar nor from the south הָרִֽים׃ <WH7311> ha-Rim. exaltation

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- But אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him But God שֹׁפֵ֑ט <WH8199> sho-Fet; [is] the judge זֶ֥ה <WH2088> zeh one יַ֝שְׁפִּ֗יל <WH8213> yash-Pil, he putteth down וְזֶ֣ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh another יָרִֽים׃ <WH7311> ya-Rim. one and setteth up

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki For כ֪וֹס <WH3563> Chos [there is] a cup בְּֽיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- For in the hand יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וְיַ֤יִן <WH3196> ve-Ya-yin and the wine חָמַ֨ר׀ <WH2560> cha-Mar is red מָ֥לֵא <WH4392> Ma-le it is full מֶסֶךְ֮ <WH4538> me-seCh of mixture וַיַּגֵּ֪ר <WH5064> vai-yag-Ger and he poureth out מִ֫זֶּ֥ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh of the same אַךְ־ <WH389> 'a-choSh- Surely שְׁ֭מָרֶיהָ <WH8105> ma-rei-ha but the dregs יִמְצ֣וּ <WH4680> yim-Tzu shall wring [them] out יִשְׁתּ֑וּ <WH8354> yish-Tu; [and] drink כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> Kol, all רִשְׁעֵי־ <WH7563> rish-'ei- thereof all the wicked אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth

וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> Va-'a-ni I אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> 'ag-Gid But I will declare לְעֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; for ever אֲ֝זַמְּרָ֗ה <WH2167> 'a-zam-me-Rah, I will sing praises לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> le-lo-Hei to the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all קַרְנֵ֣י <WH7161> kar-Nei All the horns רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked אֲגַדֵּ֑עַ <WH1438> 'a-gad-De-a'; also will I cut off תְּ֝רוֹמַ֗מְנָה <WH7311> te-ro-Mam-nah, shall be exalted קַֽרְנ֥וֹת <WH7161> kar-Not [but] the horns צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> tzad-Dik. of the righteous
